Memory Match-Match game!

Memory Match-Match game is a counter game where a point is to find pairs

When the game begins, all pictures are hidden

How to play

1. Select two cards to try match cards

2. if you match the picture u can go again

3. if they dont match computer will turn them

4. The player who find all pairs win

5. Have fun!
